original_text: You shall diligently keep the commandments of the Lord your God, and his testimonies and his statutes, which he has commanded you.
korean_text: 너희의 하나님 여호와께서 너희에게 명하신 명령과 증거와 규례를 삼가 지키며

sentences.original_text: You shall diligently keep the commandments of the Lord your God,
sentences.korean_translation: 너는 주 너의 하나님의 계명을 부지런히 지키고,

sentences.original_text: and his testimonies and his statutes,
